title: Fit Yatra - A Health and Fitness App
techStack: Kotlin, XML, Firebase ML Kit, SQLite, Python (Flask)
details: Android app with step tracking, exercise rep counting, and posture detection using mobile sensors and ML Kit with over 85% accuracy.
Personalized goal-setting, diet planning, and corrective activities integrated with Health Connect API for seamless health data aggregation.
Interactive analytics dashboards showing 7-day trends in calorie intake, calorie burn, and steps, helping users improve posture.

title: CricMate - Bowling Analysis & Coaching App
techStack: Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, Firebase ML Kit, TensorFlow Lite, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB
details: Dual-camera cricket analysis app providing frame-by-frame ML analysis of 2000+ frames to generate 3D ball trajectories using Scene View.
Real-time visualizations and interactive charts for line and angular performance metrics.
Role-based modules for Players and Coaches with an event system that shortlists players based on test scores and historical performance.

title: ClinicEase - Healthcare Management System
techStack: React Native, Spring Boot Microservices, Spring Security, Eureka, OpenFeign, API Gateway, MySQL
details: Microservices-based healthcare system with Eureka service discovery, OpenFeign for inter-service communication, and API Gateway for routing and load balancing.
JWT-based secure authentication enabling patients to book appointments, attend video consultations via WebRTC, and access medical history, test reports, and prescriptions.
Role-specific dashboards: doctors manage bookings and prescriptions; admins add doctors and assign specializations.

title: Electric Vehicle Charging Station Booking App
techStack: React Native, Redux, Express.js, Node.js, MongoDB
details: Real-time charging station locator using Google Maps API with sorting by nearby locations and live availability updates.
Booking system to reserve charging slots with real-time updates managed with Redux and secure payments via Stripe API.
User authentication and authorization, along with user reviews and ratings for charging stations to improve security and user decisions.

title: E-Cell Website
details: Developed a dynamic website to display upcoming and past events of E-Cell.
Implemented user-friendly interface with React.js for easy navigation and event discovery.

title: TPO Website
details: Created a responsive website showcasing activities, team details, and placement records.
Visualized placement data using interactive pie charts for clear insights.
